text: cool - i'll take a quick pass this morning so that I'm not blocking anyone today

If I incorrectly assign to you or gaston, please feel free to reassign directly - no need to put me in the middle. Once it's been completed, let's reassign to the original poster - I'll take a pass at verifying them in parallel.
Just realized we may need to charge some of the devices they're testing on. I'll set up a table with a few charging stations and devices this morning.
I have a galaxy s4 all charged up over here

OK, the audio capture UX is implemented (minus the native amplitude animation), Jira issues have been triaged and fixed/workedaround as much as possible for the time being, UID is natively implemented (although not talking to the JS bridge yet) and I'm ready to make a build
The current initial_experiences doesn't have the geolocation test, so if you are able to make a new test zip <@U02618EV1>, I'm ready for it

Also this upcoming Fabric build will be named 0.5, per the release milestones we have in Trello/Jira... it's a little confusing since the last build was named 1.3, but the versionCode (internal) is being updated each time, so testers should be able to upgrade to 0.5 without any surprises
And future releases will be aligned with the names we have in trello
Sounds good Marissa. Away from my Mac but should be able to send soon.
no big rush <@U02618EV1>, I'm heading out of office but will have my laptop and plan to be in wifi zone all evening
Just FYI for the rest of the team, I sent over the new test zip to Marissa.
does it need an updated initial_experiences.json too?
oops me ignorant, the zip has everything needed :simple_smile:
